title: ðŸš¨Eli Manning retiring from NFL, Does he belong in the Pro Football Hall of Fame - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/22)
description:
Eli Manning is retiring from the NFL, so Will Brinson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough fired up an on-brand emergency podcast to summarize his career and discuss the age-old question if he belongs in the Hall of Fame. They also discuss comparisons to Joe Flacco and his brother Peyton as well as what he meant to the Giants over the last 16 seasons.

itunes:subtitle: Will Brinson is joined by John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to news of Eli Manning's retirement from the NFL after 16 seasons and 2 Super Bowls.
